      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method is data binding for connection between controller and UI.
        指定者:
        initialize 在接口中 javafx.fxml.Initializable
        另请参阅:
        Initializable

      • territoryHandler

        public void territoryHandler()
        This method is responsible for filling the listView with adjacent territories from currently selected territory

      • setArmy

        public void setArmy()
        This method sets the number of available army to your occupied country

      • goToAttackPhase

        public void goToAttackPhase(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Method to set up the Attack.fxml view and set the controller (AttackController) for the view. Then, changes the scene on the stage to send user to the attack phase.
        参数:
        event - eventlistener for button clicked event
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown when view is not found

      • updateView

        public void updateView()
        This method for re-rendering the listView
